vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.30
§ Adna = "rest" or "pleasure"
1) one of the family of Pahath-moab who returned with Ezra and married a foreign wife
2) a priest, descendant of Harim in the days of Joiakim, the son of Jeshua
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Pahat-moab; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico; (b)   sacerdote; jefe de familia; tribu de Leví; tiempo de Joaquim
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿底拿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "安憩" 或 "歡愉"
1) 巴哈-摩押家族的一員, 他曾娶了一外邦女子為妻 (拉 10:30)
2) 耶書亞的兒子, 在約雅金時代, 屬哈琳家族的一位祭司 (尼 12:15)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阿底拿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "安憩" 或 "欢愉"
1) 巴哈-摩押家族的一员, 他曾娶了一外邦女子为妻 (拉 10:30)
2) 耶书亚的儿子, 在约雅金时代, 属哈琳家族的一位祭司 (尼 12:15)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.15
§ Adna = "rest" or "pleasure"
1) one of the family of Pahath-moab who returned with Ezra and married a foreign wife
2) a priest, descendant of Harim in the days of Joiakim, the son of Jeshua
